thread.title: Auburn student hit an underhanded shot from half court to win free tuition
thread.title_full: Auburn student hit an underhanded shot from half court to win free tuition

author: Emmett Knowlton (eknowlton@businessinsider.com)
title: Auburn student hit an underhanded shot from half court to win free tuition
text:
print 
Twitter/Auburn 
Auburn University junior Ben Bode won himself a cool $5,000 at halftime of an Auburn-Arkansas basketball game on Saturday when he miraculously drained a granny shot from half court.Â 
At halftime, Bode took the court as part of the Golden Flake Tuition Shootout. The contest is fairly standard as far as fan-on-the-court basketball contests go: hit a layup, and then a free throw, and then a 3-pointer, and then a half-court shot in under 24 seconds.Â 
Our man Ben did just that â going a perfect four for four.Â 
Here's the video:
